sentences.en: Campaigns of attrition are supplementary but necessary in protracted war.
sentences.cn: 战役的消耗战,是辅助的,但也是持久作战所需要的.

sentences.en: For measuring abrasion of catalyst particles, three basic attrition test apparatus are used.
sentences.cn: 为了测定催化剂颗粒的磨损, 可使用三种基本磨损测试装置.

sentences.en: In this sense war of annihilation is different from war of attrition.
sentences.cn: 在这点上说,歼灭战不同于消耗战.

sentences.en: In this sense war of annihilation is war of attrition.
sentences.cn: 在这点上说,歼灭战就是消耗战.

sentences.en: It was a war of attrition .
Objective To rebuild the occlusion of severe occlusal attrition in the seniors.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨老年人重度磨耗的重建修复.

sentences.en: Report before, iteration slight attrition injury can cause vertical form black nail.
sentences.cn: 以往报告, 反复的稍微摩擦损伤能引起纵形黑甲.

sentences.en: Roller mills grind essentially by crushing and attrition.
sentences.cn: 辊磨机主要靠挤压和摩擦研碎物料.

sentences.en: Small open torque , seat almost without attrition and long serving life.
sentences.cn: 开启力矩小,密封副无摩擦转动,阀门使用寿命长.

sentences.en: The freely parallel sliding, no attrition with other elements.
sentences.cn: 门扇自由滑行, 不与任何密封胶条产生摩擦.

sentences.en: The long war of attrition exhausted the strength of both countries.
sentences.cn: 这场长期的消耗战耗尽了两国的力量.

sentences.en: There had some attrition, no matter how close you are.
sentences.cn: 就算最要好的朋友也会有磨擦.

sentences.en: They decided to wage a war of attrition rather than to rely on an all - out attack.
sentences.cn: 他们决定打一场消耗战,而不搞全线出击.

sentences.en: This control requires knowledge of attrition kinetics and cyclone effectiveness.
sentences.cn: 这种控制要求颗粒磨损动力学和旋风分离器效率的知识.

sentences.en: We should also choose a catalyst that is resistant to attrition and breakage.
sentences.cn: 我们还应当选用耐磨和不易粉碎的催化剂.

words.tran_cn: 磨损；消耗（attrite的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 消耗，消磨，摩擦，（神学）不彻底的忏悔
trans.tran_en: the process of gradually destroying your enemy or making them weak by attacking them continuously
